item.title: By Watering Down Citizenship, Democrats Invite More Terrorists On American Soil
item.description: The New Year's Day terror attacks indicate politicians have enabled radical Islam through a weak concept of American citizenship.

item.title: Jesus Christ Takes Center Stage In This Year’s College Football Playoffs
item.description: Players from various college football teams have taken the time to praise Jesus Christ for the impact He's made on their athletic careers.

item.title: Former Iran Hostage Remembers The Weak Jimmy Carter Corporate Media Wants You To Forget
item.description: Kevin Hermening, a Marine Security Guard when the U.S. Embassy in Tehran fell, says Carter's bungling made America look like a 'paper tiger.'

item.title: Pete Hegseth’s Battle Scars Are His Strength
item.description: Pete Hegseth earned his scars honestly. He will fight for America’s warfighters and maintain our military’s lethal edge.

item.title: Why Chefs Like Me Support RFK Jr.’s Crusade To Make Food Better And Healthier
item.description: Here are three steps RFK Jr. can take immediately to change America's downward-spiraling food system.
